DOC.brief_summary: There widespread anecdotal evidence Cancer Nurse Navigators ( CNNs ) highly value cancer patient , study evaluate effect CNNs important patient-reported outcome indicator quality care . This study two aim : 1 . To assess feasibility study impact Aurora CNN Program . 2 . To pilot test effect CNN service patient-reported outcome indicator quality care .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Cancer Nurse Navigators Patient Outcomes
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult ( 18 year age old ) 2 . Treated Aurora St. Luke 's West Allis Medical Center 3 . New recurrent dx lung , prostate , colorectal breast cancer 1 . Previously receive CNN service Aurora treatment facility 2 . Unable read/write English 3 . Living nursing home/long term care facility 4 . Not capable complete study questionnaire
